entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose `IsSupported` properties on the vector types #69036
  • Support blittable type marshalling without `DisableRuntimeMarshalling` #69033
    7.0.0
  • JIT: libraries PGO assert during Find Loops #69032
    7.0.0
  • Avoid redundant marshaller copy by introducing `FromManagedValue` method #69031
  • [API Proposal]: create hardlinks #69030
  • Review .NET 5 usages #69028
  • [API Proposal]: Provide `BSTR` marshaller for `LibraryImport` source generator #69021
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add a fast Norm() or IsCloseTo(double tolerance) Function to `INumber<TSelf>` #65950
  • [API Proposal]: `IBinaryInteger<TSelf>.ReverseEndianess`. #68227
  • [API Proposal]: Rename INumber<T>.Create<TOther> to CreateNumber<TOther> #65921
  • StreamPipeReader should override CompleteAsync #67050
    Future
  • Improve UI of error dialog for missing framework/runtime #3816
    Future
  • NativeAOT: ilc compilation failure against Interop+Kernel32.GetProcAddress #69026
  • JIT should emit "movbe" instead of "mov / bswap" on compatible hardware #953
    Future
  • HttpClient not redirect when donwload picture but Chrome can. #69025
  • Occasional "Keyset does not exist" exception when calling .GetRSAPrivateKey on Windows #67752
  • Installers are a complete mess #66864

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize string.EndsWith(char) for const values #69038
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance
  • StringMarshaller optimizations #69035
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove "promoted parameter" tailcall limitation #69034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NRE in EmitCall for DynamicMethod #69027
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Remove an allocation during RSA key generation #69024
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: minor enhancement to jump threading #69022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Simple runtime.yml change hoping it fixes rolling builds not triggering #69029
    area-Infrastructure
  • Override CompleteAsync() in StreamPipeReader to call Stream.DisposeAsync #67565
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Removal of IBC infrastructure #68717
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation"" #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Workaround crash in Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native #68990
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement constant-folding for `VNF_BitCast` #68979
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • "[QUIC] Adopted msquic generated interop (#68288)" attempt no 2 #69009
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove GT_PUTARG_TYPE #68748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • `PUTARG_STK`/x86: mark `push [mem]` candidates reg optional #68641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up specialized value num functions #69013
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix scalability issue in redundant branch optimizer #68972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Updating BigInteger to implement IBinaryInteger and ISignedNumber #68964
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #68853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy propagate on `LCL_FLD`s #68592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Remove the pid argument on Windows createdump only take dumps of the parent process #68877
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Loop alignment: Fix loop size calculation to exclude IG's size that are marked as not aligned #68869
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Possible build time regression on empty macOS (Arm64) projects #25037
  • DotNet 6 on Mac M1 - high CPU use and processes stuck #23267

PullRequests

Updated

  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Extension await operator to address scoped ConfigureAwait #2649
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Minor corrections to ref fields proposal #6101

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure target-typed expressions are using the right binder for converting to the target type #61179

PullRequests

Created

  • Keep leadin trivia inside Main method… #61178
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for smart string/copy paste when the destination is a raw string literal. #61177
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge remote-tracking branch 'dotnet/main' into `features/numeric-intptr` #61174
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invoking a Minimal Web API in .NET 6 via dotnet throws an exception but runs fine as .exe #41578
  • Rendering Blazor Custom Element from Leaflet #41577
  • Blazor page relocation causes non compilable project #41576
  • Using Kestrel server with SignalR client causes hanging requests #41575
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType() #41574

Closed

  • Perf regression: https, json #41527

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573

Merged

  • Update Grpc.Core.Api to 2.45.0 and support write cancellation #41525
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview5
  • Use 1es-windows-2019 again #41547
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • HELIX failures investigations #41563
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Add a no-op IServerAddressesFeature implementation to TestServer.Features #41570
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix documentation for the property displayName in the UserLoginInfo Constructor #41565
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Improve gRPC JSON transcoding request binding and support HttpBody #41523
    area-grpc
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet-trace in container does not collect full stack information #3051

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor-MAUI Nav-Menu funky visuals on resize #6942
  • No out put from console.Writeline or Logger.LogInformation in MAUI App #6941
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'Native View not set' on Shell.Current.GoToAsync Android #6940
  • Radiobutton Content is not Displayed in Right To Left Flow Direction when ControlTemplate is applied #6939
  • Radiobutton with ControlTemplate doesn't recognize Click Event Correctly #6938
  • wrong splash screen shown under Android 12 (API 31), but is correct with Android 11 #6937
  • NavigationPage - InsertPageBefore forces visibility of the NavigationBar #6936
  • Shell Navigation with Models #6935
    Future
  • On Windows you still cannot execute an application without running it from Visual Studio #6934
  • Entry control does not call Unfocused event or disable focus when soft keyboard is closed. #6933
  • ContentPage BackgroundColor is only set once #6932
  • Shell Tabbar on Windows strange drawing if window width is resized #6931
  • Shell on Windows: Tabbar redraw problems #6929
  • Maui Picker with a Title property has no accessible name for screen readers using the UI Automation API #6928

PullRequests

Created

  • Uncomment Editor TextChanges Test #6930

Merged

  • [iOS] Add dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300

Updated

  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold -d flag does not work but the full name flag --data-annotations does work #27981

Closed

  • Calling Context.Database.Migate() bypasses DbCommandInterceptor on __EFMigrationsHistory table check. #27980

PullRequests

Updated

  • Capitalize database name #27966
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
